newsitem.title: FRANCE: TENNIS-KRAJICECK FINED FOR SHUNNING PRESS CONFERENCE.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-KRAJICECK FINED FOR SHUNNING PRESS CONFERENCE.

text.p: Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek was fined $2,000 for refusing to attend a post-match press conference after his defeat to Australian Patrick Rafter at the French Open on Saturday.
"Richard Krajicek has refused to attend the press conference. He has accepted to pay the $2,000 fine," organisers said.
The Dutchman, seeded sixth, lost the third round tie 6-3 4-6 6-4 6-2.
